EmailTemplate.name: Incoming SMS alert
EmailTemplate.subject: HTML Preview
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi Please note that an SMS has been received from the mobile number associated with {!smagicinteract__Incoming_SMS__c.Contact__c}'s record. The text of the SMS says:{!smagicinteract__Incoming_SMS__c.smagicinteract__SMS_Text__c}" Please click here to see the record: {!smagicinteract__Incoming_SMS__c.Link} ----- This is an automated email, sent whenever a new SMS is received.
